Posts.Content: Commercials on TV Is MBC so prevalent that these pharmaceutical companys see a potential for making big bucks? I don’t know anyone who is in Stage IV except me and people on this website. But, then again, I don’t tell too many people and maybe others don’t share that info either. Thoughts anyone? Maybe it’s not talked about like people on anti-depressants— it’s a hush hush topic, but a lot of people need it.
Posts.Title: Commercials for Ibrance, etc.

Posts.Content: Hello. I’ve been on Ibrance and Femara for a year, Mets to the lungs. Has anyone developed a deep, dry cough? It’s been going on for a week. Ctscans show stable with 2 lesions getting bigger. Dr. Prescribed nose spray thinking it’s allergies, but 4 days later I’m still coughing. Anyone else experience this obnoxious cough?
Posts.Title: Coughing
